## Description {#details}

Subclass of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> for the sole purpose of identifying the success path in the type system.

This allows to catch invalid conversion to Expected&lt;T&gt; at compile time.

Definition at line 335 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.
